@gis_michelle @EnvAgency Thank you Michelle and the rest of the team. Amazing work!
👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻
@JoKingDevon @BrentGoose @EnvAgencySW I wasn’t aware of that Jo , but it’s all awful , and for the most part it’s avoidable , less meetings and more action is my motto

There was more pollution flowing into Shutterton Brook yesterday and it’s still not recovered from the last pollution events. That all flows into a wildlife refuge of SSSI Exe Estuary 🤷‍♀️@EnvAgencySW
